item.title: Blogging with Hugo
item.author: Author
item.description:
While you code, you should comment and document what you are doing.

Boring, isn’t is?

But it actually helps a future developer, usually you after three days, to understand what you did and to start modifying and integrating your script.

So, dear future me, this is How I Built Your Blog!

item.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hugo
item.author: Author
item.description:
Welcome to the new iteration of my blog!
“Wait, what?! Does it mean there are other versions of this thing?”
I am glad you are so interested, dear reader!
“Not really… But, please, continue…”
